title: Patriots’ dynasty had help, players should root for the Rams, Andy Reid needs the win and Brees is better than Rodgers
itunes:title: Patriots’ dynasty had help, players should root for the Rams, Andy Reid needs the win and Brees is better than Rodgers
description:
Colin discusses how all dynasties like the New England Patriots have a little help during their run, why people should be cheering for the Los Angeles Rams, why Kansas City Chiefs HC Andy Reid needs to win this weekend, and why people should be more impressed with New Orleans Saints QB Dree Brees than Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers. Guests include Nick Wright, Bob Glauber, Chris Broussard, and Derrick Johnson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
